title: Four UWA researchers among chosen few for Antartica tour (University of Western Australia)
text: ( Source : University of Western Australia ) When Amanda Blythe , Sandra Kerbler, Ghislaine Platell and Melinda Fitzgerald decided to pursue a career in science at The University of Western Australia , they had no idea they would be among 78
